# Sanjaya J. Shetty

> R & AWS Developer — Building scalable analytics and modelling systems for finance and risk.

## About

I build analytics and modelling applications using R and R Shiny, mainly in credit risk, climate risk, regulatory stress testing, and pharma analytics. I work on AWS-based deployments and integrate applications using React, Flask, and R Plumber, using Docker and PostgreSQL in my workflow. Currently exploring Rust to expand my development skills.

- Location: India
- Open to opportunities
- Resume: https://SanjayShetty01.github.io/resume.pdf

## Skills

R, AWS, SQL, Python, Rust, Shiny, Data Analysis, Credit Risk, Machine Learning, Git

## Experience

### Senior Data Associate — Crisil (Oct 2025 – Present)
Training & Induction at the moment.

### Consultant, R Shiny — EY India (Jul 2024 – Oct 2025)
Developed and deployed credit risk systems using R Shiny, optimized R workflows, containerized applications with Docker, and integrated React-based frontends for scalable performance.

### Senior Analyst, R Shiny — DataZymes (Jan 2023 – Jun 2024)
Built and scaled Pharma Analytics systems using R Shiny and Plumber APIs, significantly improving performance and efficiency. Led AWS integration with modern web stacks, introduced Git-based workflows, and implemented modular architecture standards.

### Data Analyst — Cointab (Aug 2022 – Dec 2022)
Designed and implemented business logic for automated reconciliations using proprietary in-house systems, adapting solutions to client requirements.

### Economic Research Intern — FKCCI, Bangalore (Feb 2020 – May 2020)
Conducted economic research and authored reports on agricultural reforms (APMC), COVID-19's socioeconomic impact, and state budget analysis for Karnataka.

## Education

B.E. in Chemical Engineering — B.M.S. College of Engineering, Bangalore (2016 – 2020)

## Projects

### RCognito — AWS Cognito Wrapper for R
An R package that simplifies integration with AWS Cognito services, enabling secure authentication and user pool management directly from R applications.
- CRAN: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RCognito/index.html
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/RCognito
- Tech: R, AWS, R Package

### Lunexa — Arbitrage & Hedge Calculator
A precision-focused betting calculator designed to help identify and manage risk-free opportunities using real market odds.
- Demo: https://sanjayshetty01.shinyapps.io/Lunexa/
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/Lunexa/
- Tech: R, R Shiny

### implied
A Rust-based CLI tool that converts different betting odds formats into implied probabilities.
- Releases: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/implied/releases
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/implied
- Tech: Rust, CLI

### capture_text — Screen Text Extraction Tool
A cross-platform command-line utility for extracting text from anywhere on the screen using OCR.
- Releases: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/capture_text/releases/tag/v0.1.1
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/capture_text
- Tech: Rust, Screen OCR, CLI

### Stint — F1 Ranking Dashboard
An interactive R Shiny application providing F1 driver and constructor rankings and performance insights.
- Demo: https://sanjayshetty01.shinyapps.io/Stint/
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/Stint
- Tech: R, Shiny, GitHub Actions, SQLite, Prompt-Engineered

### Specie — Discord Game Insights Dashboard
An interactive R Shiny application providing income analysis and performance insights for the Evolution Farm Discord game.
- Demo: https://sanjayshetty01.shinyapps.io/Specie/
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/Specie
- Tech: R, Shiny, GitHub Actions

### Data Visualization Repo
An R project focused on strengthening data visualization skills using ggplot2.
- Demo: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/Data-Visualization/blob/main/README.md
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/Data-Visualization
- Tech: R, Shiny, ggplot2

### NIFTY 50 Open Price Forecasting
An integrated forecasting project leveraging news sentiment, historical data, and ML models to estimate next-day NIFTY 50 opening prices.
- Demo: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/PredictingOpeningPriceNifty50#introduction
- Source: https://github.com/SanjayShetty01/PredictingOpeningPriceNifty50
- Tech: Python, ML, Sentiment Analysis, Time Series, AWS

### Implementing India VIX in R
A full implementation of the India VIX calculation methodology from scratch in R.
- Demo: https://gist.github.com/SanjayShetty01/01e700b6c1fadf0e76c5b7361c14d7d2
- Tech: R, Options Data, Volatility Modeling, Financial Engineering

### Payoff vs Probability — Monte Carlo Simulation
A statistical simulation exploring why payoff structure matters more than raw probability in decision-making.
- Demo: https://gist.github.com/SanjayShetty01/927f0a0cf0bfe479ebf1f28240cc6331
- Tech: R, Monte Carlo Simulation, Probability, Statistics

### Intraday VWAP Strategy — Bank Nifty Backtest
A rule-based intraday trading strategy backtested on Bank Nifty using VWAP breakout signals.
- Demo: https://colab.research.google.com/gist/SanjayShetty01/85c377f5b2236713dbed111e11cee5d5/rg-enterprises-workbook.ipynb
- Source: https://gist.github.com/SanjayShetty01/85c377f5b2236713dbed111e11cee5d5
- Tech: Python, Quant Strategy, Backtesting, Market Data
